summary: Adds an invisible Dawnguard Light Helmet for sale by Gunmar in Fort Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml: This adds a helmet (displayed as a circlet) to Gunmar\'s merchant inventory, in Fort Dawnguard. This does not replace the current dawnguard light helmet. The helmet shares the same stats although when equipped it can\'t be seen nor does it affect your hair, so it looks exactly like your character looks like without a helmet.
author: Grithyn
